What have I done?

  • Get an idea for a demo that is simple enough.
  • Setup my environment:
    • Open my favorite IDE (WebStorm).
    • InitGitHubrepo.
    • Add some Gulp tasks for automation for the project. I'm usingTypeScript,JadeandLessto make my dev life easier.
  • Created amarkupfor the site.
  • CreatedMouseMoveListenerclass that handles the events of the mouse and vector decoration.
  • CreatedVectormodule that provides the mathematics behind the vector angle and length.
  • The vector itself is swinging around withCSS only.JavaScript just provides the values.
  • Last thing was to improve the performance, because listening mouse movements is pretty intense. So I added a throttle function for the handler. See forUtilsmodule in the source.
